story.title: My Story
story.intro: A journey through code, creativity, and continuous learning.

beginning.title: The Beginning
beginning.content: My journey into software development started over 15 years ago, fueled by a curiosity about how things work and a desire to create. What began as tinkering with websites quickly evolved into a deep passion for building digital products.

evolution.title: Technical Evolution
evolution.content1: Over the years, I've worked across the full stack‚Äîfrom crafting pixel-perfect user interfaces to designing robust backend systems and cloud architectures. I've seen technologies come and go, and I've learned that the fundamentals matter more than the latest trends.
evolution.content2: My technical toolkit includes React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, and various cloud platforms. But more importantly, I understand when to use each tool and when to keep things simple.

roots.title: Creative Roots
roots.content: Before diving deep into code, I spent years in creative fields. This background informs how I approach problem-solving today‚Äîwith empathy for users, attention to detail, and an appreciation for elegant solutions.

philosophy.title: Philosophy
philosophy.content: I believe in building software that serves people, not the other way around. This means:

list.item1: Clean architecture that scales with your needs
list.item2: Code that other developers can understand and maintain
list.item3: Solutions that solve real problems, not imaginary ones
list.item4: Honest assessment of trade-offs and complexity

philosophy.conclusion: I'm not interested in hype or overengineering. I'm interested in building things that work, that last, and that make people's lives a little bit better.
